rarePulls.name: Gay Cow
rarePulls.description: Moooooo. Moo? Moo moo moo. Mooooooooooo. Mooo. Moo. Moooo.

rarePulls.name: Suddle
rarePulls.description: this sad puddle is…well sad. It lays on the ground all day hoping to one day dry up.

rarePulls.name: Bloop and Blorp
rarePulls.description: Though physically inseparable, their personalities couldn’t be more different. They bicker constantly, making daily tasks hard for them.
